title: Learning Analytics Ethical Framework Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Data Analysis and Understanding of Educational Technology (EdTech)
context.additional_context: Conducting PBL activities using language learning data in digital environments. Developing ethical guidelines through collaboration among professionals.

learning_goals: Ability to explain core ethical issues in learning analytics (LA) (e.g., privacy, data transparency) with ≥80% accuracy.
Analysis of research trends in LA ethics by applying systematic literature review methodologies.
Team-based design of a draft LA ethics checklist applicable to a specific language education institution.
Presentation of ≥5 evaluation criteria for the feasibility of an ethics framework based on project outcomes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
